name: E-Pen
description: ERGA® – Italian Top Quality Pens -- Since 1968. Details.....make it big --- PaolaMoriDesign, A design of short clip that provides even wider decoration area, retractable ballpoint pen, nontoxic ABS, chromed metal and nontoxic Terlux, transparent shiny finishing, high quality Germany black ink refill with tungsten carbide ball, 4000m.
additionalInfo: Italian Design and Make. Exclusive to Dex Collection in Australia and New Zealand.
